articles.author: WION Web Team
articles.title: Chinese researchers claim to develop AI nanny. Find out the truth - WION
articles.description: In what may seem like a rerun of a Hollywood movie, Chinese researchers have claimed to develop an artificial intelligence nanny, which can monitor and take care of embryos as they grow into foetuses in an artificial womb environment.
articles.urlToImage: https://cdn.wionews.com/sites/default/files/styles/story_page/public/2022/01/31/237398-ai-nanny.jpg, which can monitor and take care of embryos in an artificial womb environment (representative image).  " typeof="foaf:Image" />
